text: With Western Hegemony Failing, Global Stability Is On The Brink." The decline of Western dominance is threatening global stability, and the implications are severe. The reluctance of Italy and Spain to address this issue is concerning, as it may embolden Russia to take advantage of the situation. The conditional stance of US President Trump on NATO's defense commitments only adds fuel to the fire. The warnings from Russian President Vladimir Putin must be taken seriously, as the conflict in Gaza and Ukraine could escalate into a global crisis. It is imperative that we address this issue promptly and work towards a peaceful resolution before it's too late.
